Title: Four Months Later...
Plot: Four months after the events of the showdown between Sylar and Peter, new Heroes emerge. These include brother and sister Alejandro and Maya. Hiro remains in the past, but what will come of this? Someone dies and someone isn't dead. Claire and her father and the rest of their family get a new life.
GuestStars: Adetokumboh M'Cormack, Lisa Cohen, Casey Washington, Mark Colson, Kiko Kiko, Milos Milicevic, Rene L. Moreno, Dianna Agron, David Anders, Lyndsy Fonseca, Sara Solomon, Barry Shabaka Henley, Lauren Stamile, Brian K
